text: Following are the results of the 1953 Soviet First League football championship. FC Dinamo Minsk winning the championship. ==First stage== ===Zone I=== ===Zone II=== ===Zone III=== ==Second stage== ===For places 1-6=== Sep 13-27, Gorkiy ===For places 7-9=== ===For places 10-12=== Sep 27 - Oct 1, Baku ===For places 13-15=== [Oct 11, Riga] * Daugava Riga 2-0 Avangard Chelyabinsk * Dinamo Alma-Ata withdrew. ===For places 16-18=== Sep 29 – Oct 3, Kishinev ===For places 19-21=== Sep 27 – Oct 1, Sverdlovsk ===For places 22-24=== Sep 26-29, Dnepropetrovsk ===For places 25-27=== Sep 25-29, Moskva ==See also== * 1953 Soviet Class A * 1953 Soviet Cup ==References== * 1953 at rsssf.com 1953 2 Soviet Soviet
title: 1953 Soviet Class B
